## CCSelectorCombinedProps.value property

> This API is provided as an alpha preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Variable holding the value of the phone number input field. Provide this when you wish to use the component as a controlled component.

**Signature:**

```typescript
value?: string;
```
